name: KIDS (itch)
description:
Promotional game developed for JUBEL and music artist MAVRICK for his song release, KIDS. 

The game is played in your browser and works on basically all modern touch devices / smartphones and computers! Enjoy!

The game can also be found and played on Game Jolt.

If you have any issues with the game visit https://www.weld.io/kids-the-game-troubleshooting/

Game design: Tomas Lundgren

Art & animation: Samuel Modig

Audio: Christopher Peduru Aratchii

Music: Mavrick
